verses.arabic: حمٓ
verses.arabicSimple: حمٓ
verses.translation: Ha, Meem.
verses.transliteration: Haa Meeem

verses.arabic: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: By the clear Book,
verses.transliteration: Wal Kitaabil Mubeen

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَـٰرَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَـٰرَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn [mankind].
verses.transliteration: Innaaa anzalnaahu fee lailatim mubaarakah; innaa kunnaa munzireen

segments.translation: Indeed, We revealed it in a Night Blessed
Indeed, We [We] are ever warning

verses.arabic: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
verses.translation: On that night is made distinct every precise matter -
verses.transliteration: Feehaa yufraqu kullu amrin hakeem

verses.arabic: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
verses.translation: [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]
verses.transliteration: Amram min 'indinaaa; innaa kunnaa mursileen

segments.translation: A command from Us
Indeed, We [We] are ever sending

verses.arabic: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.arabicSimple: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
verses.transliteration: Rahmatam mir rabbik; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

segments.translation: As Mercy from your Lord
Indeed, He [He] is the All-Hearer the All-Knower

verses.arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain.
verses.transliteration: Rabbis samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa; in kuntum mooqineen

segments.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between both of them
if you are certain

verses.arabic: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers.
verses.transliteration: Laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa yuhyee wa yumeetu Rabbukum wa Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen

segments.arabic: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ
segments.translation: There is no god except Him He gives life and causes death
segments.transliteration: lā ilāha illā huwa yuḥ'yī wayumītu

segments.translation: your Lord and the Lord of your fathers the former

verses.arabic: بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves.
verses.transliteration: Bal hum fee shakkiny yal'aboon

verses.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِى ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱرْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِى ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke.
verses.transliteration: Fartaqib Yawma taatis samaaa'u bidukhaanim mubeen

verses.arabic: يَغْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ ۖ هَـٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: يَغْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ ۖ هَـٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Covering the people; this is a painful torment.
verses.transliteration: Yaghshan naasa haazaa 'azaabun aleem

verses.arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers."
verses.transliteration: Rabbanak shif 'annal 'azaaba innaa mu'minoon

verses.arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.
verses.transliteration: Annaa lahumuz zikraa wa qad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum mubeen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."
verses.transliteration: Summaa tawallaw 'anhu wa qaaloo mu'allamum majnoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَآئِدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا كَاشِفُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَآئِدُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief].
verses.transliteration: Innaa kaashiful 'azaabi qaleelaa; innakum 'aaa'indoon

segments.translation: Indeed, We will remove the punishment a little
indeed, you will return

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ ٱلْبَطْشَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ ٱلْبَطْشَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
verses.translation: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution.
verses.transliteration: Yawma nabtishul batsha tal kubraa innaa muntaqimoon

verses.arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger,
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad fatannaa qablahum qawma Fir'awna wa jaaa'ahum Rasoolun kareem

verses.arabic: أَنْ أَدُّوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: أَنْ أَدُّوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: [Saying], "Render to me the servants of Allah. Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger,"
verses.transliteration: An addooo ilaiya 'ibaadal laahi innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

segments.translation: That Deliver to me the servants of Allah
Indeed, I am to you a Messenger trustworthy

verses.arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority.
verses.transliteration: Wa al laa ta'loo 'alal laahi innee aateekum bisultaanim mubeen

segments.translation: And that do not exalt yourselves against Allah
Indeed, I [I] have come to you with an authority clear

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
verses.translation: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.
verses.transliteration: Wa innee 'uztu bi Rabbee wa rabbikum an tarjumoon

verses.arabic: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ لِى فَٱعْتَزِلُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ لِى فَٱعْتَزِلُونِ
verses.translation: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."
verses.transliteration: Wa il lam tu'minoo lee fa'taziloon

verses.arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.
verses.transliteration: Fada'aa rabbahooo anna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmum mujrimoon

verses.arabic: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.translation: [Allah said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued.
verses.transliteration: Fa asri bi'ibaadee lailan innakum muttaba'oon

verses.arabic: وَٱتْرُكِ ٱلْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱتْرُكِ ٱلْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.translation: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned."
verses.transliteration: Watrukil bahra rahwan innahum jundum mughraqoon

segments.translation: And leave the sea at rest
Indeed, they are an army to be drowned

verses.arabic: كَمْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.arabicSimple: كَمْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: How much they left behind of gardens and springs
verses.transliteration: Kam tarakoo min jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

verses.arabic: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: And crops and noble sites
verses.transliteration: Wa zuroo'inw wa maqaa min kareem

verses.arabic: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا۟ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا۟ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And comfort wherein they were amused.
verses.transliteration: Wa na'matin kaanoo feehaa faakiheen

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people.
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika wa awrasnaahaa qawman aakhareen

verses.arabic: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنظَرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنظَرِينَ
verses.translation: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.
verses.transliteration: Famaa bakat 'alaihimus samaaa'u wal ardu wa maa kaanoo munzareen

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
verses.translation: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment -
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad najjainaa Baneee Israaa'eela minal'azaabil muheen

verses.arabic: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors.
verses.transliteration: Min Fir'awn; innahoo kaana 'aaliyam minal musrifeen

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqadikh tarnaahum 'alaa 'ilmin 'alal 'aalameen

verses.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَـٰٓؤٌا۟ مُّبِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَـٰٓؤٌا۟ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial.
verses.transliteration: Wa aatainaahum minal aayaati maa feehi balaaa'um mubeen

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, these [disbelievers] are saying,
verses.transliteration: Inna haaa'ulaaa'i la yaqooloon

verses.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
verses.translation: "There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.
verses.transliteration: In hiya illaa mawtatunal oolaa wa maa nahnu bimun shareen

verses.arabic: فَأْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَأْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."
verses.transliteration: Faatoo bi aabaaa'inaaa inkuntum saadiqeen

verses.arabic: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals.
verses.transliteration: Ahum khayrun am qawmu Tubba'inw wallazeena min qablihim; ahlaknaahum innahum kaanoo mujrimeen

segments.arabic: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ
segments.translation: Are they better or the people of Tubba and those before them before them
segments.transliteration: ahum khayrun am qawmu tubbaʿin wa-alladhīna min qablihim

segments.translation: We destroyed them
indeed, they were criminals

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ
verses.translation: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa baina humaa laa'ibeen

verses.arabic: مَا خَلَقْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: مَا خَلَقْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know.
verses.transliteration: Maa khalaqnaahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ مِيقَـٰتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ مِيقَـٰتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all -
verses.transliteration: Inna yawmal fasli meeqaatuhum ajma'een

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped -
verses.transliteration: Yawma laa yughnee mawlan 'am mawlan shai'anw wa laa hum yunsaroon

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.arabicSimple: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Except those [believers] on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Illaa mar rahimal laah' innahoo huwal 'azeezur raheem

segments.translation: Except on whom Allah has mercy Allah has mercy
Indeed, He [He] is the All-Mighty the Most Merciful

verses.arabic: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.translation: Indeed, the tree of zaqqum
verses.transliteration: Inna shajarataz zaqqoom

verses.arabic: طَعَامُ ٱلْأَثِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: طَعَامُ ٱلْأَثِيمِ
verses.translation: Is food for the sinful.
verses.transliteration: Ta'aamul aseem

verses.arabic: كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَغْلِى فِى ٱلْبُطُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَغْلِى فِى ٱلْبُطُونِ
verses.translation: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies
verses.transliteration: Kalmuhli yaghlee filbutoon

verses.arabic: كَغَلْىِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: كَغَلْىِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: Like the boiling of scalding water.
verses.transliteration: Kaghalyil hameem

verses.arabic: خُذُوهُ فَٱعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: خُذُوهُ فَٱعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,
verses.transliteration: Khuzoohu fa'tiloohu ilaa sawaaa'il Jaheem

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا۟ فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا۟ فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water."
verses.transliteration: Summa subboo fawqa raasihee min 'azaabil hameem

verses.arabic: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْكَرِيمُ
verses.arabicSimple: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْكَرِيمُ
verses.translation: [It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble!
verses.transliteration: Zuq innaka antal 'azeezul kareem

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمْتَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمْتَرُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute."
verses.transliteration: Inna haazaa maa kuntum bihee tamtaroon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place;
verses.transliteration: Innal muttaqeena fee maqaamin ameen

verses.arabic: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Within gardens and springs,
verses.transliteration: Fee jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

verses.arabic: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
verses.translation: Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other.
verses.transliteration: Yalbasoona min sundusinw wa istbraqim mutaqaabileen

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.translation: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
verses.transliteration: Kazaalika wa zawwajnaahum bihoorin 'een

verses.arabic: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.translation: They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure.
verses.transliteration: Yad'oona feehaa bikulli faakihatin aamineen

verses.arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire
verses.transliteration: Laa yazooqoona feehal mawtaa illal mawtatal oolaa wa qaqaahum 'azaabal jaheem

segments.arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ
segments.translation: Not they will taste therein the death except the death the first
segments.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā l-mawta illā l-mawtata l-ūlā

segments.translation: And He will protect them from the punishment of the Hellfire

verses.arabic: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.arabicSimple: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment.
verses.transliteration: Fadlam mir rabbik; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

segments.translation: A Bounty from your Lord
That it will be the success the great

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, We have eased the Qur'an in your tongue that they might be reminded.
verses.transliteration: Fa innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika la'allahum yatazakkaroon

verses.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱرْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ
verses.translation: So watch, [O Muhammad]; indeed, they are watching [for your end].
verses.transliteration: Fartaqib innahum murta qiboon
